name: rcrdflp
description:
In this roleplaying game for 3-6 players you get to create a collaborate story experiences using elements from your favorite record!

Create characters, create the setting based on the album art, drop the needle on side A to establish your story, add some chaos when you flip the record, and resolve the action until side B runs out!

Designed by Jason Kotarski (Singing Lungs, Green Couch Games, Questionable Mono Tapes, The Great Heartland Hauling Co.)
